original_text: So they poured out for the men to eat. And it came to pass, as they were eating of the pottage, that they cried out, and said, O thou man of God, there is death in the pot. And they could not eat thereof.
korean_text: 이에 퍼다가 무리에게 주어 먹게 하였더니 무리가 국을 먹다가 그들이 외쳐 이르되 하나님의 사람이여 솥에 죽음의 독이 있나이다 하고 능히 먹지 못하는지라

sentences.original_text: So they poured out for the men to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리서 그들은 사람들이 먹도록 음식을 따랐다.

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass, as they were eating of the pottage,
that they cried out, and said,
there is death in the pot.
And they could not eat thereof.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것을 먹을 수 없었다.
